ee nisa age maranayata wishala pirisak sahabhagi wi atha.me maranaya saka katayuthu maranayak nisa maradana polisiye di ikuth 18 wanida wibhagayak karana lesa illa sanjiwa piris mahatha paminillak da kara thibe.maranayata hethuwa washayen dakwa thibenne sathkamen pasu shariraye abhyantharaye rudhiraya wahanaya wima nisa athi wu kampanayen aya miya giya bawa ya.me marana hethuwa prathikshepa karana sanjiwa piris sathkamedi siduwu athwaraddak nisa biriyage maranaya siduwu aakaraya pilibanda sampurna parikshanayak karana lesa polisiyen illa siti.

dhira, wira, miththa, bhadra, upasama aadihu aya samangama mahana wu athara therika, muththa, punna, thissa, chiththa, miththa, kapila wanshika bhadra, guththa, rankaru diyani subha, jiwaka ambaa wanayehi subha aadihu maha prajapathi gothamiya yatathe pawidi bawa labuha.
